Generation VIII.Sword: When it contracts its body, over 220 pounds of sand sprays from its nose. If it ever runs out of sand, it becomes disheartened.
Generation VIII.Shield: Its unique style of coiling allows it to blast sand out of its sand sac more efficiently.

Generation IX.Scarlet: It will expand its body as much as it can and then contract itself, blasting out sand with enough force to wash away a dump truck.
Generation IX.Violet: The sand it spews contains sharp, pointy gravel, which is actually just sand that Sandaconda's saliva has hardened into irregular shapes.
